lead_paragraph: President Robert Mugabe of Zimbabwe, one of Africa’s most divisive figures, was appointed to the rotating chairmanship of the African Union by the organization’s leaders on Friday.
snippet: President Robert Mugabe of Zimbabwe, one of Africa’s most divisive figures, was appointed to the rotating chairmanship of the African Union by the organization’s leaders on Friday.

headline.main: Zimbabwe’s President Is Appointed Chairman of African Union
headline.print_headline: Zimbabwe’s President Is Appointed Chairman of African Union
